races.analysis_summary: High confidence in the McEvoy/Milnes runner Cyclotron. Purchased for $200k and has shown ability in jumpouts. The stable is elite with 2yos. Super Wonder is the main danger coming off a trial win.

selections.name: Cyclotron
selections.reason: Expensive purchase from elite 2yo stable. Trialled well and draws perfectly.

selections.name: Super Wonder
selections.reason: Won a trial at this track. Jolly stable is dangerous with juveniles.

selections.name: Chica Astuta
selections.reason: Stokes stable runner who won a jumpout. Respect market moves.

selections.name: Crazyaboutzou
selections.reason: Trialled second here recently. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Super Wonder
danger_horse.reason: Local trial winner with home track advantage.

races.analysis_summary: Messy maiden field. Ramasis showed promise on debut running 2nd. Sicilian Princess is consistent. Jumbo Jet is a watch from the Stokes yard.

selections.name: Ramasis
selections.reason: Strong 2nd on debut. Draws well and should improve.

selections.name: Sicilian Princess
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer. Placed 3 of last 4.

selections.name: Jumbo Jet
selections.reason: Stokes debutant. Trialled well. Watch betting.

selections.name: Aramoso
selections.reason: Long-time maiden (29 starts) but places often. Exotics only.

danger_horse.name: Sicilian Princess
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form makes her a safe option in a weak race.

races.analysis_summary: Mostly For Show has strong form lines and looks ready to peak. Bootlegger loves this track. Dirty Old Town is a last start winner who is improving.

selections.name: Mostly For Show
selections.reason: Runner-up last start in similar grade. Consistent and rates highest.

selections.name: Bootlegger
selections.reason: Track specialist (4:1-0-0). Good 2nd last start.

selections.name: Dirty Old Town
selections.reason: Last start winner. Draws the inside and maps well.

selections.name: Freedom Flame
selections.reason: Class runner resuming. Watch for late market support.

danger_horse.name: Bootlegger
danger_horse.reason: Proven performer at this track and distance.

races.analysis_summary: The track downgrade to Soft 5 hurts the top pick Andrew's Memory (0/5 on soft). Longer Route and Imposing Suspect handle the conditions better. Longer Route was dominant last start.

selections.name: Longer Route
selections.reason: Easy winner last start. Handles soft (7:2-1-0). Up in trip suits.

selections.name: Imposing Suspect
selections.reason: Proven wet tracker (15:4-1-2 on soft). Consistent.

selections.name: Andrew's Memory
selections.reason: Chasing hat-trick but soft track stats are a concern.

selections.name: Savsonic
selections.reason: Consistent mare who handles the ground. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Imposing Suspect
danger_horse.reason: Superior wet track form compared to the favorite.

races.analysis_summary: Open race. Big Brute is consistent and overdue. Autumn Frost has a great record at the track. Acappella Moon is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Big Brute
selections.reason: Consistent type (15:2-3-3). Placed last 2 starts.

selections.name: Autumn Frost
selections.reason: Won here previously. Good 2nd last start. Draws well.

selections.name: Acappella Moon
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Maps to get a good run.

selections.name: Round Two
selections.reason: Forgive last start. Previous form was solid.

danger_horse.name: Autumn Frost
danger_horse.reason: Track specialist who will appreciate the conditions.

races.analysis_summary: Stokomo is the form horse, runner-up in last two. Scandalize is consistent. Hysterical Lady is always competitive.

selections.name: Stokomo
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with two consecutive 2nds. Ready to win.

selections.name: Scandalize
selections.reason: Consistent. Placed last start. Draws the rail.

selections.name: Hysterical Lady
selections.reason: Placed 3 of last 4. Handles soft going.

selections.name: Annihilate
selections.reason: Drops in grade? Solid 3rd last start.

danger_horse.name: Scandalize
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who maps perfectly from barrier 1.

races.analysis_summary: Streetcar Apollo is a last start winner who defeated Tapinforpar. With key scratches, he looks the one to beat. Tapinforpar is the main danger.

selections.name: Streetcar Apollo
selections.reason: Last start winner beating the main rival here. In peak form.

selections.name: Tapinforpar
selections.reason: Runner-up to Streetcar Apollo last time. Weight swing favors him slightly.

selections.name: Watadeel
selections.reason: Class horse resuming. Watch betting.

selections.name: Zebella
selections.reason: Stokes runner. Can improve on recent form.

danger_horse.name: Tapinforpar
danger_horse.reason: Close 2nd to top pick last start. Meets him better at the weights.

races.analysis_summary: Track downgrade significantly impacts Mintulee (0/8 on soft). Daisydoo (won last start) and Brave Star handle the wet much better. Going for value with Daisydoo.

selections.name: Daisydoo
selections.reason: Last start winner. Handles soft track (4:1-1-2). In form.

selections.name: Brave Star
selections.reason: Resuming. Proven wet tracker (16:2-3-5 on soft). Class runner.

selections.name: Mintulee
selections.reason: Fast horse but poor soft track record (0/8). Risk on wet ground.

selections.name: Nextonixs
selections.reason: Consistent. 3rd last start. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Brave Star
danger_horse.reason: Class horse with superior wet track statistics.

races.analysis_summary: Very open race. Bangholme is in winning form. Mercury Eight is consistent. Effusiv ran well last start.

selections.name: Bangholme
selections.reason: Last start winner. Handles soft. Wide gate the only concern.

selections.name: Mercury Eight
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent type.

selections.name: Effusiv
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start. Draws well.

selections.name: In Love
selections.reason: Competitive in this grade. Each way chance.

danger_horse.name: Mercury Eight
danger_horse.reason: Consistent and maps to get a good run.

races.analysis_summary: Crespiano is a progressive 3yo taking on older horses. Won well last start. Joviale is also a last start winner. Rubini ran 2nd to Joviale.

selections.name: Crespiano
selections.reason: Progressive 3yo coming off a win. Upside against exposed older horses.

selections.name: Joviale
selections.reason: Last start winner. In career best form.

selections.name: Rubini
selections.reason: Runner-up to Joviale last time. Weight swing?

selections.name: Katim's Club
selections.reason: Consistent veteran. Placed last start.

danger_horse.name: Joviale
danger_horse.reason: Beat many of these last start. Hard to knock winning form.
